summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning and the Sand Point Overlay District; amending the Official Land Use Map, Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 23.32, to modify and rename the subarea boundaries of the Sand Point Overlay District; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.72.004, 23.72.008, 23.72.010, 23.84A.025, 23.84A.030, and adding a new Section 23.55.032.
